mapper.select: SELECT board_type from board where board_id=#{boardId}
SELECT p.post_no, p.board_id, p.title, p.view_count, p.regdate, b.board_type FROM post p JOIN board b ON p.board_id = b.board_id where p.board_id=#{boardId}
SELECT * FROM post WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND POST_No = #{postNo}

SELECT c.user_no, c.comment_content, c.regdate, c.like_count, c.parent_id, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY c.post_no) AS comment_count FROM post p join post_comment c on p.post_no=c.post_no WHERE p.board_id = 1 AND p.POST_No = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND POST_No = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_COMMENT ( USER_NO, BOARD_ID, POST_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, REGDATE ) VALUES ( #{userNo}, #{boardId}, #{postNo}, #{commentContent}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
INSERT INTO POST (POST_NO, USER_NO, BOARD_ID, TITLE, VIEW_COUNT, REGDATE, CONTENT) VALUES ({#postNo}, #{userNo}, #{boardId}, #{title}, {#viewCount}, SYSDATE, {#content})
